title: Happy Mother’s Day – I Love My Beautiful Mom | Olay
description:
For Mother’s Day, Olay asked children around the world: ”What makes your mom beautiful?” See mom’s beauty through the eyes of these adorable little ones. When was the last time you told mom she was beautiful? Isn’t it time to start again? Share this heartwarming Mother’s Day video and tell your mom how beautiful she is.

This video is about Mother's Day and children around the globe reminding us what makes moms beautiful. Brought to you by Olay.

asset.author: Olay North America
asset.hookText:
For Mother’s Day, Olay asked children around the world: ”What makes your mom beautiful?” See mom’s beauty through the eyes of these adorable little ones. When was the last time you told mom she was beautiful? Isn’t it time to start again? Share this heartwarming Mother’s Day video and tell your mom how beautiful she is.

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING] 

[NON-ENGLISH SPEECH]

[NON-ENGLISH SPEECH]

[NON-ENGLISH SPEECH]

The thing that I like best about my mum is her freckles. 

[NON-ENGLISH SPEECH]

I love my mom so much! 

[NON-ENGLISH SPEECH]

Bigger than the whole universe! 

[NON-ENGLISH SPEECH]

Olay, your best beautiful.
